title: Will your catalyst for the Corona virus verify your tax refund in 2020?
subtitle: Although the incentive payment is technically a tax deduction, it has been classified as such only so that the Government can make payments using the existing infrastructure of the Tax Service.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: Incentive payments for the Corona virus, called "economic impact payments," are taxed and can reduce your tax refund for 2020.
